articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT rahat.eth
Learn about building on Polygon and and possibly join @developer_dao. Doesn't get better than that.
Polygon Guild Ahmedabad 💜: Want to get exclusive memberships of @developer_dao???
Then you have to take part in Gujarat's biggest Web3 Event...
We have 3 D_D membership giveaways, hurry up and register fast, seats are limited
 https://lu.ma/PolygonGuildAhmedabad

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
The biggest StarkNet event in Asia 🤯
Bengaluru — Nov 30 - Dec 1 ⏱
A two-day event that will be a mix of talks, panels, hacking, and brainstorming on ZK and Cairo (the base language of StarkNet). 🔥
Registration is now open ⚡️
Starknet.cc (Bangalore 🇮🇳 Nov 30 - Dec 1): ZK, Cairo, StarkNet, and Ethereum curious chads!! 
Get ready for the biggest StarkNet event in Asia. The StarkNet community will take over Bengaluru from Nov 30 - Dec 1.
Register to participate- 
Follow this thread 🧵 to learn more about what to expect 👇
 https://starknet-cc.devfolio.co/
articles.title: The biggest StarkNet event in Asia 🤯 Bengaluru — Nov 30 - Dec 1 ⏱ A two-day event that will be a mix of talks, panels, hacking, and brainstorming...

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Stef(🧱,🚀)
Update...we won a bounty from @xmtp_!! 🎉🎉🎉
Next level shipping 🚀
A group of women in tech from @herdaolatam @Web3Familia
and @developer_dao
Plus different parts of the world Peru, Spain, and America. 
I don't speak Spanish and they do😅
Stef(🧱,🚀): First in-person web3 hackathon with @ETHGlobal for #ETHSanFrancisco2022 🚀
Built so much in a short time with this amazing team from @herdaolatam 💫
 Built a platform to assist people that are victims of sexual assault on college campuses.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Great opportunity for female and non-binary developers to have a chance at winning a Developer DAO membership 🤩
D_D Women: We are excited to partner with @PhoenixGuildHQ, to onboard more female and non-binary developers into the world of solidity.✨
We will be sponsoring two @developer_dao  memberships to participants who complete the bootcamp.
Register here, to get started:
 https://lu.ma/0gs7o1kb?s=09
articles.title: Great opportunity for female and non-binary developers to have a chance at winning a Developer DAO membership 🤩
